title: Elementary Physical Education Design During the Pandemic: Outdoor Exercise-Centered Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of physical education and understanding of elementary curriculum standards
context.additional_context: Exploration of safe physical education design and outdoor activity management during pandemics

learning_goals: Can propose three or more designs for elementary outdoor physical education classes considering pandemic constraints
Can develop formative assessment tools to evaluate the effectiveness of physical education in blended learning environments
Can plan outdoor exercise programs aligned with students' physical development goals
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
